forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. North wind 3 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn greets Downtown San Francisco with a veil of clarity, the sun preparing to cascade its golden light across the cityscape. The day begins under a sunny disposition, with temperatures poised near a crisp 58 degrees. As the morning matures, it will gently descend to about 53, accompanied by a playful northwest wind that will dance through the streets, gusting to 25 mph and adding a brisk touch to the air. 

Tonight, as shadows emerge, the skies will remain mostly clear, giving way to a serene night where the low dips to a modest 44 degrees, only to rise slightly, embodying a most peaceful evening. Those venturing outdoors should don layers—a light jacket to fend off the morning chill, perhaps a scarf to wrap around the neck, and sturdy shoes for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or the iconic hills. These conditions invite strolls through the Presidio or a visit to the less trodden corners of Golden Gate Park, where tranquility reigns. The absence of fog today makes it an ideal time for an exploration of the vibrant streets, showcasing local cafes or perhaps an artisanal bookshop, infusing the day with simple pleasures that befit the spirited charm of this city.
